title: Thank You My God
sinopse:
Throwing away his hometown and family, Nico left home with empty hands. He then meets a young man in a foreign land, Eli. But he's suddenly faced with affection from his younger brother who came looking for him, Will, and the letters that keep coming from his mother...

The various forms of love revolving around Nico are all here.

(Source: Fujoshi Bitches)
